description.value: If Vlaakith takes radiant damage, her regeneration doesn't function on her next turn.

Necrotic

Aura 5

Any living creature that enters or starts its turn in the aura takes 10 necrotic damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Psychic, Weapon

Standard

+26 vs AC; 2d10+4 damage plus 1d10 psychic damage.

Basic Attack

Charm, Implement, Psychic

Minor, Recharges when first bloodied

+25 vs Reflex; 2d12+5 psychic damage, and the target is dominated (save ends). While the target is dominated, any enemy of Vlaakith that starts its turn within 2 squares of the target takes 15 psychic damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Implement, Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 10

+25 vs Fortitude; 3d8+4 necrotic damage. In addition, until the end of Vlaakith's next turn, the target is slowed and takes a -4 penalty to all defenses.

At-Will ✦ Implement, Necrotic

Immediate Reaction

Targets the triggering enemy

Trigger: When an enemy hits vlaakith with a melee attack, at-will

+25 vs Reflex; 2d10+8 necrotic damage, and the target is banished to a remote region of Tytherion. While banished, the target takes no actions. At the end of its next turn, the target returns to the same square it occupied (or the nearest empty square).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Vlaakith makes three crippling ray attacks, each against a different target.

At-Will ✦ Psychic, Weapon

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Close burst 10

Targets one enemy; +26 vs AC; 1d10+4 damage, and ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Implement, Necrotic

Minor 1/Round

Close burst 2

+23 vs Fortitude; 3d6+3 necrotic damage. In addition, Vlaakith gains a +2 bonus to her next attack roll before the end of her turn.

When Vlaakith drops to 0 hit points, her body and possessions crumble into dust, but she is not destroyed. She and her possessions reappear adjacent to her phylactery in 1d10 days, unless the phylactery is also destroyed.

Encounter

Move

Vlaakith or an ally within 10 squares of her can fly 5 squares.

system.biography:
HP 788; Bloodied 394
Regeneration 10
Resist 15 necrotic Vulnerable radiant (if Vlaakith takes radiant damage, her regeneration doesn’t function on her next turn) Immune disease, poison 		Init +10 | AP 2 | Save +5 (+7 against charm effects)
AC 35Fort 31Ref 34Will 32
Speed 7
Ability ScoresStr 14 (+12)
Con 21 (+15)		Dex 11 (+10)
Int 26 (+18)		Wis 19 (+14)
Cha 23 (+16)
Languages Common, Deep Speech, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +23, Bluff +21, Insight +19, Intimidate +21, Religion +23Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 24 | Insight 29

Equipment silver greatsword, scepter (rod)
